thread.title: Martin Keown: This Arsenal star must improve if they want to beat Chelsea
thread.title_full: Martin Keown: This Arsenal star must improve if they want to beat Chelsea

title: Martin Keown: This Arsenal star must improve if they want to beat Chelsea
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Martin Keown: This Arsenal star must improve if they want to beat Chelsea MARTIN KEOWN has challenged Mesut Ozil to make just a small improvement to his game if Arsenal are to beat Chelsea. PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 04:10, Fri, Feb 3, 2017 
Arsenal suffered a galling 2-1 defeat at home to Watford on Tuesday night. 
Antonio Conte â€™s meanwhile took a point away from Anfield as Chelsea drew 1-1 away to Liverpool. 
Ozil has been in scintillating form this term, although has been accused of being anonymous in the big games. GETTY Mesut Ozil has been instrumental for Arsenal this term GETTY Arsene Wenger needs a response from his side against Chelsea Arsenal player ratings against Watford Tue, January 31, 2017
